family_class_considerations: spouse eligibility under subsection 117(9) of the Regulations
misrepresentation_or_fraud: lacked credible evidence of declaring marital status at entry

credibility_findings: credibility issues arose regarding port entry declarations
application_details: applicant failed to inform Canadian Embassy of his marriage, did not complete required forms
decision_reasoning: applicant did not meet legal obligations
result_of_case: judicial review dismissed; spouse remains ineligible for family class immigration
conclusion_outcome: court upheld that the applicant did not meet legal obligations
